item.title: Feature Flags In Laravel
item.description: Overview Library is https://github.com/friendsofcat/laravel-feature-flag/ Listen here Watch https://youtu.be/4nq7FyHQj8I We are working on using FeatureFlags or Toggles in our applications. For one we are aiming to do all our work on mainline branch at all times so this would be a key coding discipline to use FeatureFlags so we can hide a feature in progress knowing it will not interfere with the application. For example if a hotfix or another feature is ready to go to production we can push that with no worries of the in progress feature.
